items.name: Shapeshifter's Stew
items.description: A hearty, slowly simmering stew that changes color and flavor with each spoonful. Served with crusty garlic bread.

items.name: Siren's Song Seafood Pasta
items.description: Black squid ink pasta tossed with an assortment of seafood in a creamy sauce, garnished with edible flowers.

items.name: Phantom's Chicken Slider
items.description: A ghostly white sandwich made with shaved chicken, white cheddar, and caramelized onions on a pale roll.

items.name: Werewolf's Full Moon Burger
items.description: A juicy burger topped with a full moon-shaped fried egg, blue cheese, and bacon on a jet-black bun.

items.name: Enchanted Forest Salad
items.description: Mixed greens with roasted root vegetables, candied nuts, and a tangy vinaigrette. Served in a smoke-filled glass cloche.

items.name: Moonlit Mist
items.description: A shimmering lavender latte infused with vanilla and star anise, topped with a swirl of silvery foam.

items.name: Witch's Brew
items.description: A steaming, color-changing tea that shifts from deep purple to midnight blue as you drink.

items.name: Spectral Sparkle
items.description: Effervescent lemon-lime soda with a splash of butterfly pea flower syrup, served over glowing ice cubes.

items.name: Vampire's Kiss
items.description: Rich, dark hot chocolate with a hint of cherry, topped with blood-red whipped cream.

items.name: Ghostly Chai
items.description: A misty, spiced chai latte made with almond milk and dusted with cinnamon "ash."

items.name: SÃ©ance Espresso
items.description: A potent double shot of espresso served in a smoked glass, accompanied by a fortune cookie.

items.name: Diviner's Drip
items.description: Our house blend coffee brewed to perfection, served with a side of flavored "crystal" sugar sticks.

items.name: Oracle Oolong
items.description: A delicate oolong tea served in a clear glass teapot with a "floating" fortune ball that reveals your tea leaves.

items.name: Midsummer Night's Green Tea
items.description: A refreshing green tea infused with mint and elderflower, served over a glowing ice sphere.

items.name: Graveyard Dirt Cake
items.description: Layers of rich chocolate cake and creamy pudding, topped with crushed cookies and gummy worms.

items.name: Crystal Ball Sorbet
items.description: A sphere of clear, lemon-basil sorbet that reveals your "fortune" (a fruit compote center) as it melts.

items.name: Banshee's Scream Sundae
items.description: Vanilla bean and blackberry ice creams with a tart berry coulis, topped with meringue "ghosts."

items.name: Faerie Ring Donuts
items.description: A trio of mini donuts glazed with shimmering, edible luster dust in magical flavors: rose gold, mint green, and lavender.

items.name: Midnight Shadow Tart
items.description: A dark chocolate ganache tart with a constellation of edible silver stars, served on a smoky mirror glaze.
